resources.string: Unable to pick file. Check status of file manager.
Of course this app is open source. You always have the privilege to make your own modifications to this app. The source code link is in the about section.

Hello Users,

As you all know, this app has not gotten any updates recently. I am in my senior year of high school, bombarded with classes and college apps, which results in not that much free time for this app. Pdf Viewer Plus is open source, if any of you all would like to contribute, please do so. Because I have only been programming since the beginning of my high school career, my code might not be neat or follow up with any models or standards (that is why I need you guys!). Send me an email through the about page, or you can just go on to the Github repo (which the link is also in the about page).

Thanks for your patience!
Of course this app needs permission to access the phone\'s storage. Please click on the button and allow the app the to read the phone\'s storage. Without it, the app will not work properly.
